item.title: Return to Monkey Island (2022)
item.description: Here’s something I didn’t think we’d ever get: a new Monkey Island from Ron Gilbert. And as expected it fits in perfectly with the first two Monkey Island games. My first contact with the Monkey Island series was with The Curse of Monkey Island. I did not know at that time that it was the third entry in the series, but I remember enjoying the humor and slapstick. I didn’t get much further than the second chapter as a kid, although I finished it sometime later with a walkthrough.
